game.name: Spooky Halloween Ice Cream
game.description:
Halloween is just around the corner. Everyone is pretty excited to try something different to make his/her celebration special. If you love cooking, Spooky Halloween Ice Cream gives you a wonderful opportunity to show your skills. In this extremely challenging and fascinating free online cooking game, your job is to help the most gorgeous yet friendly Princesses to prepare some scrumptious Halloween ice cream. Will you give your valuable assistance to make them feel proud? These beautiful women also want your help to get them ready for this special event. 

In this exclusive cooking girls game, our sexy Princesses have already dressed up for Halloween after cooking the treats. Now they have a wish to prepare a mouth-watering Halloween ice cream within the shortest time possible. Help these girls to get this one of the most popular desserts. Do not forget to decorate it with the help of awesome Halloween theme treats once you complete its cooking job. The easy control, fantastic gameplay and amazing graphics of this cool flash game are enough to make your gaming experience wonderful.

When you play this flash game in your browser, you are always suggested to follow all the useful instructions with an open mind. Try to complete the job shortly in order to gain the maximum points and claim for your victory at the end of this free online gaming activity. You have to use your cooking skills, creativity, and, of course, patience to get your ice cream prepared as soon as possible. Good luck to create the best ice cream ever for Halloween!
